forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 51F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 50F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
